sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnqainfo ( QA_ID /* */ , QESTN_SJ /* */ , QESTN_CN /* */ , WRITNG_DE /* */ , RDCNT /* */ , EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE /* */ , WRTER_NM /* */ , ANSWER_CN /* */ , WRITNG_PASSWORD /* */ , ANSWER_DE /* */ , EMAIL_ANSWER_AT /* */ , AREA_NO /* */ , MIDDLE_TELNO /* */ , END_TELNO /* */ ) VALUES ( #qaId# /* */ , #qestnSj# /* */ , #qestnCn# /* */ , #writngDe# /* */ , #rdcnt# /* */ , #emailAdres# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #qnaProcessSttusCode# /* */ , #wrterNm# /* */ , #answerCn# /* */ , #writngPassword# /* */ , #answerDe# /* */ , #emailAnswerAt# /* */ , #areaNo# /* */ , #middleTelno# /* */ , #endTelno# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnqainfo SET QA_ID=#qaId# /* */ , QESTN_SJ=#qestnSj# /* */ , QESTN_CN=#qestnCn# /* */ , WRITNG_DE=#writngDe# /* */ , RDCNT=#rdcnt# /* */ , EMAIL_ADRES=#emailAdres# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE=#qnaProcessSttusCode# /* */ , WRTER_NM=#wrterNm# /* */ , ANSWER_CN=#answerCn# /* */ , WRITNG_PASSWORD=#writngPassword# /* */ , ANSWER_DE=#answerDe# /* */ , EMAIL_ANSWER_AT=#emailAnswerAt# /* */ , AREA_NO=#areaNo# /* */ , MIDDLE_TELNO=#middleTelno# /* */ , END_TELNO=#endTelno# /* */ WHERE QA_ID=#qaId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT QA_ID /* */ , QESTN_SJ /* */ , QESTN_CN /* */ , WRITNG_DE /* */ , RDCNT /* */ , EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE /* */ , WRTER_NM /* */ , ANSWER_CN /* */ , WRITNG_PASSWORD /* */ , ANSWER_DE /* */ , EMAIL_ANSWER_AT /* */ , AREA_NO /* */ , MIDDLE_TELNO /* */ , END_TELNO /* */ FROM comtnqainfo WHERE QA_ID=#qaId# /* */

SELECT QA_ID /* */ , QESTN_SJ /* */ , QESTN_CN /* */ , WRITNG_DE /* */ , RDCNT /* */ , EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE /* */ , WRTER_NM /* */ , ANSWER_CN /* */ , WRITNG_PASSWORD /* */ , ANSWER_DE /* */ , EMAIL_ANSWER_AT /* */ , AREA_NO /* */ , MIDDLE_TELNO /* */ , END_TELNO /* */ FROM comtnqainfo WHERE 1=1
QA_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
QESTN_SJ LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY QA_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnqainfo WHERE 1=1
QA_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
QESTN_SJ LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
